settings.icon_subtitle: Everything is designed and made in-house, and can be adjusted to your exact specifications. Now that‚Äôs what we call personal service!

settings.title: READY TO LIGHT UP 2023
settings.text: Our custom neons are the bright sparks that always stand out

settings.title: WANT TO BRING AN IDEA TO LIFE?
settings.content: You‚Äôve come to the right place my neon-loving friend! All you need to do is get your idea down on paper so we can see what you have in mind, and we‚Äôll take care of the rest. A quick image, a scribble on a piece of paper, or even an artistic sketch if you‚Äôre feeling confident will work wonders. From there we‚Äôll do the boring technical stuff, put it all together, and add the all-important finishing touches prior to shipping. All you have to do is sit back, take it easy, and tell anyone who will listen that you‚Äôve just got your latest masterpiece commissioned. Like the sound of that?
settings.contact_subtitle: Fill out the form below, a member of our team will get back to you within the day.

settings.title: Custom Neon Lights For You
settings.Subtitle:
LET‚ÄôS GET YOU STARTED!
Upload your image with a couple of quick clicks and we‚Äôll take it from there. Easy!

Custom Neon Lights For You
You want the finer things in life, and that means breaking the cycle of following the crowd. They find some good stuff, sure; but they never find great stuff. We know you can create something truly great when you put your mind to it!

settings.title: A Unique Design No One Else Has
settings.Subtitle: Tired of that friend who always seems to beat you to it? We were too, which is why we want you to put them in their place once and for all with a custom light they‚Äôll never have seen before

settings.title: Bright Ideas Become Bright Neons
settings.Subtitle: The brightest of bright ideas deserve to be captured for the rest of the world to see, which is where we come in. By taking care of the boring stuff we help your creativity be seen in style for miles around.

settings.title: See Your Idea Up In Lights
settings.Subtitle: Tired of that friend who always seems to beat you to it? We were too, which is why we want you to put them in their place once and for all with a custom light they‚Äôll never have seen before

settings.ans_title1: You send us an image of what you want and we‚Äôll make it for you. We can‚Äôt put it any simpler than that my friend!
settings.qus_title2: What do you make signs from?
settings.ans_title2: None of the nasties thanks to our tried and trusted LED Flex. Mercury and toxic gases have no place here, and why should they be welcome in your home either?
settings.ans_title3: We need you to get busy being creative so you come up with a bright spark you‚Äôll love. We‚Äôll then bottle that spark and turn it into your very own custom neon light.
settings.ans_title4: Our typical return time is within 3-5 weeks. If you want an update at any point, you know where to find us.

settings.description1: Want to work with a team of bright sparks just like you? We don‚Äôt blame you, which is why we want you to send your proposals to info@neonstore.co. Once you do, we‚Äôll be in touch to get the ball rolling.
settings.description2: Of course you do! If you have a business, a bright idea or just a passion for what we‚Äôre doing here, we‚Äôd love to hear how you can help us reach an even bigger audience. Send over a message and we‚Äôll be in touch in a flash!

settings.title: WELCOME TO THE NEON STORE!
settings.subtitle1: As a new business built on bright ideas (pun intended), we love nothing more than bringing your vision to life. By getting creative, having fun, and bringing new ideas to the table, we turn your ideas into quality products you‚Äôll never want to be without. We love everything about customer service and going the extra mile for you.  But that‚Äôs enough about us‚Ä¶let‚Äôs shine a light on you (another pun) for a minute. We know you want stress-free products that light up the place and make you smile, so that's exactly what we‚Äôll give you. Each one is like the ideal roommate who never makes a noise or leaves a mess. All your neon will do is welcome you home to put your feet up.
settings.subtitle2: Want to talk neons? We ship all over the world... all you have to do is contact us.

settings.heading: How Do We Make Your Neon Sign?
settings.subheading: Everything is handmade with the personal touch, because nothing else will do. To make it happen in style, we use nothing but high quality LED flex cased in flex rubber tubing, before mounting on a clear acrylic backboard. We‚Äôve even got some new rose gold if that‚Äôs what you have your eye on.

settings.heading: What Types Of Neon Signs Do We Make?
settings.subheading: We‚Äôll make anything and everything you want. Tabletop neon lamps, box neon night lights, aesthetic light up signs, neon sculptures, and floor standing neon light signs are what we do best. Simply tell us what you need and we‚Äôll take it from there.

settings.heading: What About The Power Supply?
settings.subheading: Good question my friend! Each sign comes complete with an Australian certified power adaptor (our gift to you), plus a 1-2 m* clear cord. The clear cord is plugged into the power adaptor, which has another 1-2 m* of clear cord ‚Äî now that‚Äôs smart!

settings.heading: How About The Fancy Options?
settings.subheading: We can supply a remote control, dimmer, and flashing neon lights ‚Äî whatever you need, we‚Äôll take care of it in a flash. If you treat yourself to a remote control, you can also toggle between 10 brightness settings, and steal the show by getting it to flash at a whole host of speeds!

settings.heading: Isn‚Äôt It Hard To Hang LED Wall Signs?
settings.subheading: Don‚Äôt believe the rumours! Hanging our signs is so easy because they come with pre-drilled holes. We‚Äôll even swap you a wall mounting kit for a few extra dollars if you want to really tackle this like a pro!

settings.heading: What About The Planet?
settings.subheading: We care about going green just as much as you do, which is why we‚Äôve gone for low energy designs as standard. They use a fraction of the power of real glass or vintage neon signs, which is good news for everyone.

settings.heading: How Long Do Our LED Neon Lights Last?
settings.subheading: 50,000 hours is the standard, which means typically 10 years, or 5 years if it looks so good you never want to turn it off.

settings.heading: Are LED Neon Lights Safe?
settings.subheading: LED flex doesn‚Äôt have any of that nasty mercury or toxic gas, no breakable glass, and it‚Äôll never get hot. If there‚Äôs a safer sign that‚Äôll look better in a kid‚Äôs bedroom, we‚Äôd be amazed! *The exact length of the cord depends on the size of the sign. Trust us, we know what we‚Äôre doing!
